content.question: <math alttext="the integral from, negative 1 to 1, of, the fraction with numerator 3 times x squared, plus 2 x, plus 1, and denominator x plus 2, end fraction, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle><mtext> </mtext><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="negative 8 plus, 9 times the natural log of 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mi>ln</mi><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="16 plus, 17 times the natural log of 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>16</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>17</mn><mi>ln</mi><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="negative 8 plus, 9 times the natural log of 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mi>ln</mi><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
